Welcome to Learning FinTech

This site provides an introduction to data science and fintech using the Python programming language. No prior programming experience is required.

A live demo for the first chapter of the book is available on Google Colaboratory.


Topics include:

Programming logic

Debugging code

Data visualization

Solving financial problems

Blockchain technology

Statistical analysis

Web scraping

Textual analysis

Simulation
2021 James Nordlund
For related material, check out the FinTech Innovations Lab.
